title: Zlateh the Goat
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Winter is late so for Reuven the furrier it is a bad year. After long hesitation he decides to sell Zlateh the goat. However, the pet goat is spared from the butcher’s knife when she saves her young master from a snowstorm.
creator_credit_for_label: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
